mapper.select: SELECT n.nego_num, n.item_num, n.nego_chat, n.nego_chat_date, m.member_name FROM nego_chat n JOIN item i ON n.item_num = i.item_num JOIN member m ON i.member_num = m.member_num WHERE n.item_num = #{itemNum}
mapper.insert: insert into nego_chat (nego_num, item_num, nego_chat, nego_chat_Date) values(nego_num_seq.nextval, ${itemNum}, #{negoChat}, sysdate)
